trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer"></xref> class with a default token serializer.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.CertificateValidationMode%2A><xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.RevocationMode%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.TrustedStoreLocation%2A> properties are initialized to the following values: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultCertificateValidationMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultRevocationMode?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultTrustedStoreLocation?displayProperty=fullName>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer"></xref> class that uses the specified token serializer.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.CertificateValidationMode%2A><xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.RevocationMode%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.TrustedStoreLocation%2A> properties are initialized to the following values: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultCertificateValidationMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultRevocationMode?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultTrustedStoreLocation?displayProperty=fullName>.
The token serializer that will be used to serialize security tokens.
Gets or sets the validation mode of the X.509 certificate that is used to sign the metadata document.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the X.509 certificate validation mode.
Gets or sets the certificate validator for the X.509 certificate that is used to sign the metadata document.
The certificate validator for the X.509 certificate.
Creates a security token service descriptor.
Gets the X.509 certificate created from the specified key identifier.
By default, this method only supports key identifier clauses of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>.
You can override this method to support other kinds of key identifier clauses.
This method is invoked by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.ValidateSigningCredential%2A> method.
The key identifier from which to create the X.509 certificate.
The X.509 certificate that was created from the specified key identifier.
Cannot find a key identifier clause of type in ski.
Enforces the default behavior, you can override this method to support other key identifier clauses.
A string constant that defines the language attribute, "xml:lang".
A string constant that defines the language local name, "lang".
A string constant that defines the language namespace URI, "http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace".
A string constant that defines the language prefix, "xml".
The default implementation requires that the content of the Attribute element be a simple string.
To handle complex content or content of declared simple types other than xs:string, override this method.
Extensibility point for reading custom attributes.
The type that represents the metadata element that is being read; for example, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.ContactPerson"></xref>.
Extensibility point for reading custom elements.
The type that represents the metadata element that is being read; for example, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.ContactPerson"></xref>.
`true` if an element of type T is read; otherwise, `false`.
Extensibility point for reading custom RoleDescriptors.
The entity descriptor for adding the Role Descriptors
Thrown if the XML is not well-formed.
Thrown if the XML is not well-formed.
Reads the specified stream to deserialize an entity descriptor or an entities descriptor.
An instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class.
Reads the specified XML reader to deserialize an entity descriptor or an entities descriptor.
The XML reader to be read.
An instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class.
Read the given XmlReader to deserialize an entity descriptor or an entities descriptor.
The XML reader to be read.
The token resolver to use to resolve the signature token.
An instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class.
Reads an entity descriptor or an entities descriptor.
This method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.ReadMetadata%2A> methods.
An instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class.
The reader is not positioned on an `<EntityDescriptor>` or an `<EntitiesDescriptor>` element.
`true` if an element is read; otherwise, `false`.
Reads a security token service descriptor.
`true` if an element is read; otherwise, `false`.
`true` if an element is read; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the revocation mode of the X.509 certificate that is used to sign the metadata document.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the X.509 certificate revocation mode.
Gets the token serializer that is used by the current instance to serialize security tokens.
The token serializer that is used by the current instance.
Gets the list of trusted issuers that are trusted to sign the metadata document by the current instance.
Gets or sets the trusted store location of the X.509 certificate that is used to sign the metadata document.
One of the enumeration values that specify the X.509 certificate store location.

Validates the X.509 certificate that signed the metadata document against the trusted issuers list specified by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.TrustedIssuers"></xref> property.
This method is invoked by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.ValidateSigningCredential(System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials)"></xref> method.
By default, this method does not perform any validation.
Provide your own implementation to perform trusted issuer validation.
Validates the signing credentials of the metadata document.
The credentials that were used to sign the metadata document.
Extensible point to write custom attributes.
The type that represents the element whose attribute is being written.
Extensible point to write custom elements.
The type that represents the element that is being written.
Writes the federation metadata to the specified stream.
The stream to which to write the federation metadata.
Writes the federation metadata to the specified XML writer.
The XML writer to which to write the federation Metadata
An instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class.
Writes a security token service descriptor.
Writes the web service descriptor attributes.
Writes a web service descriptor element.
